message: Bob, I'm pleased to offer you my product for $1,450,000. This is a fair price that allows us both to benefit from the transaction. Please let me know if you're interested.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,300,000. This is the highest price I'm willing to pay for the product.

Bob, I understand your position.  While I appreciate your offer, I'm still committed to getting a price closer to my asking value.  I'm willing to come down to $1,375,000. This is a fair compromise that allows us both to make a reasonable profit.  Let me know if you're interested in this offer.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit far from my target. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $1,200,000 and $1,375,000, so I'm thinking of $1,287,500. This is the highest price I'm willing to pay for the product.
